T04TD3906E:305b-4: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T04TD3906E:305b-5: sems brtag brjod phyir gus phyag 'tshal //
T04TD3906E:305b-6: nyon mongs las dang sdug bsngal dang //
T04TD3906E:305b-7: dad sogs dge dang bde ba dang //
T04TD3906E:305b-8: thar pa 'dod pa thams cad dang //
T04TD3906E:305b-9: sems las byung ba yin par gsungs //
T04TD3906E:305b-10: sems ma bsgoms pas thog med nas //
T04TD3906E:305b-12: de spang bde dang thar pa ni //
T04TD3906E:305b-13: don du gnyer bas sems la brtag / chags sdang rmongs dang rnam rtog dang //
T04TD3906E:305b-14: nga rgyal cha mnyam can gyis ni //
T04TD3906E:305b-15: thams cad bsdus pa yin par 'dod //
T04TD3906E:305b-16: srog gcod la sogs mi dge las //
T04TD3906E:305b-17: skye ba la sogs sdug bsngal lo //
T04TD3906E:305b-18: mi sdug byams pa rten 'brel dang //
T04TD3906E:305b-19: dbugs bgrang khams dbye gang 'dod kyi //
T04TD3906E:305b-20: dmigs pas nyon mongs can gyi sems //
T04TD3906E:305b-21: rim pa bzhin du spong bar 'gyur //
T04TD3906E:305b-22: gang gis gang la ji lta bur //
T04TD3906E:305b-23: sgom pa gzhan las bstan pa yin //
T04TD3906E:305b-24: de med phyir ni de mi 'byung //
T04TD3906E:305b-25: de yang med par 'gyur ba yin //
T04TD3906E:305b-26: mi rtag pa yi lcag gis ni //
T04TD3906E:305b-27: dad pa'i rtsa la sems gnas bya //
T04TD3906E:305b-28: ngo tsha khrel yod grogs kyis ni //
T04TD3906E:305b-30: bsrung ba bag yod bsgom bya ste //
T04TD3906E:305b-31: gnas pa ting nge 'dzin gyis ni //
T04TD3906E:305b-32: ngo bo ma chags la sogs kyis //
T04TD3906E:305b-33: bsgoms pa byams pa snying rje yi //
T04TD3906E:305b-34: rtsa ba can gyi byang chub sems //
T04TD3906E:305b-35: bdag gzhan mnyam nyid brje ba yin //
T04TD3906E:305b-36: sems dpag med pa bsgom par bya //
T04TD3906E:305b-37: de las bsod nams dpag med 'byung //
T04TD3906E:305b-38: 'khor ba'i bde ba dpag tu med //
T04TD3906E:305b-39: mi dge ba ni thag ring ste //
T04TD3906E:305b-40: thar pa'ang gam na 'dug pa yin //
T04TD3906E:305b-42: 'od gsal stong pa nyid yin no //
T04TD3906E:305b-43: rtag tu de ni bsgom par bya //
T04TD3906E:305b-44: sgrib pa bag chags bcas pa spong //
T04TD3906E:305b-45: ye shes tshogs ni dpag tu med //
T04TD3906E:305b-47: dngos por lta bar 'gyur bas na //
T04TD3906E:305b-48: bdag dang bdag 'dzin la sogs pas //
T04TD3906E:305b-50: rten gyi sgo nas yang mi 'grub //
T04TD3906E:305b-51: snang du rung las ma dmigs dang //
T04TD3906E:305b-52: rdul phran dpyad pa'i rigs pa yis //
T04TD3906E:305b-53: rten gyis rab tu mi 'grub bo //
T04TD3906E:305b-55: da ltar skad cig mi gnas phyir //
T04TD3906E:305b-56: dus gsum 'gag pa'i rigs pa yis //
T04TD3906E:305b-57: dpyad na de yang mi 'grub po //
T04TD3906E:306a-3: rgyu las kyang ni mi 'grub ste //
T04TD3906E:306a-4: yul las skye na gnyis su 'gyur //
T04TD3906E:306a-5: snga ma las skyes dang po ni //
T04TD3906E:306a-6: snga ma rgyu med can du 'gyur //
T04TD3906E:306a-7: rgyu med phyir na skye ba med //
T04TD3906E:306a-8: nam mkha' la sogs ji bzhin no //
T04TD3906E:306a-9: sgrub byed med phyir mi 'grub ste //
T04TD3906E:306a-10: gzhan gyis 'grub na sems tsam nyams //
T04TD3906E:306a-11: 'dod na'ang rnam bcas rnam med kyis //
T04TD3906E:306a-12: 'grub pa rab tu bkag pa yin //
T04TD3906E:306a-13: gnyis med phyir na de mi 'grub //
T04TD3906E:306a-14: mdzub mo'i rtse mo ji bzhin no //
T04TD3906E:306a-15: phyi rol 'gog pa'i rigs pa yis //
T04TD3906E:306a-16: sems la'ang ci yi phyir mi gnod //
T04TD3906E:306a-17: mdo las kyang ni gsal por gsungs //
T04TD3906E:306a-18: de phyir de ni stong nyid grub //
T04TD3906E:306a-19: de nyid gnyis kyi tshul gyis ni //
T04TD3906E:306a-20: sems ni legs par bsgom par bya //
T04TD3906E:306a-21: sems dul ba ni legs pa ste //
T04TD3906E:306a-22: bslab pa thams cad srung bar 'gyur //
T04TD3906E:306a-23: sems dul bas ni bde ba 'dren //
T04TD3906E:306a-24: sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam dag 'gyur //
T04TD3906E:306a-25: 'di las byung ste skye bo rnams //
T04TD3906E:306a-26: 'di don myur du rtogs gyur cig / sems brtag pa slob dpon tshul khrims 'phags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T04TD3906E:306a-29: lo ts'a ba chos 'bar gyis zhus te gtan la phab pa //
